website_summaries.verdict: This shampoo will leave even the thickest hair silky smooth.
pros: Adds shine, moisture, and body to hair without being heavy or greasy
Theorie's shampoo is also color-safe, and a good pick for those with damaged and brittle hair
cons: Folks with thin hair may experience thinning from this shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Not made for fine hair. Causes shedding.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does not lather well. I need a good six pumps to achieve a good lather. It's also drys out my hair and provides no hydration whatsoever despite having Argan oil in it. The real reason I'm giving it two stars is b/c it has made my hair shed like crazy. I have very fine and very soft hair and my guess is that this shampoo is not meant for fine, soft hair.
customer_reviews.author: ETL

customer_reviews.title: Best for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best shampoo that works for me. Most shampoos that say moisturizing will dry out my hair. It seems like a lot of money for shampoo but it last me well over a year. My hair stylist says that my hair has little damage from coloring, blowing and straightening. She is impressed since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: TjandD

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Since TJ Maxx is closed, I needed this product, thankfully Amazon had it. my hair is pretty dry and this helps calm my hair down and restore it.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Its best to use the Theorie cream rinse with it
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo the first time last spring and I will remain a fan. We have hard water and this shampoo relieves the dryness and brittle strands caused by this type of water. It takes a couple of shampoos to notice the difference. Its best to use the Theorie cream rinse with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Theorie!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Theorie user for several years now and as a hair stylist I have tried many, many different brands over the years but Theorie is a winner! Their products all smell AMAZING and are lightweight and effective. They also don’t leave a residue which many other brands tend to do from the silicones in their products. Not easy to find always and not cheap but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Makes Us Itchy!
customer_reviews.text: I used it at a friend's house on my little girls and they loved it. Bought it and it just seems like it's got something wrong with it. My 2 and 4 year old are constantly scratching their heads as am I. I guess this was a giant waste of money. :(
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Deep moisture
customer_reviews.text: This brand should be better known. I find the products are consistently good and the fragrances are unique. Deeply moisturizing for hair in dry climate/hard water.
customer_reviews.author: FrenchFry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use hairspray or any other products in my hair. This shampoo didn’t do much as wash out a little bit of hairspray I’d had to use one day. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey J.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for dry & kinky hair
customer_reviews.text: Great for dry, kinky-curly hair. Nice slip, nice scent and the size is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: we love this product a little goes a long way makes your hair nice and soft
customer_reviews.author: A. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Lathers up expremely well and cleans my hair and scalp without leaving it dry.Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timster97

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. It’s very expensive. For this price I usually bought the bigger one. I usually bought the product at Marshalls but the store is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has restored my damaged and over processed hair back to health. It's great for restoring and maintaining. The whole line of products for damaged hair is honestly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pereira

customer_reviews.title: The best for softening coarse hair!
customer_reviews.text: The best product for taming my thick, course hair. It even makes it feel soft and controls the frizz!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy DeBerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo has really helped my hair, will definately continue buying it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gutierrez Duran

customer_reviews.title: Dad is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and the performance rivals the more expensive stuff. Dad is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Prentice Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this shampoo and conditioner and am so happy I can order off amazon. No hassle
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The seller sucks, but product is amazing if you can get it delivered in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Silky and Shiny!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I've used for my hair. Leaves it silky smooth and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo and conditioner for keratin and color treated hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, and it was delivered on time , I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: My friend recommended this product to me
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product to me, it will be my new product to use. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: angelanne

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing product I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing product I've ever used. I've been booked for nearly a year. Doesn't strip my keratin or color. My keratin lasted 6 months! Love love love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kunya Jones

customer_reviews.title: sad it has sulfates
customer_reviews.text: I do like this shampoo but sad it has sulfates. won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. I have waist length fine hair and it doesn't weigh it down. It has kept my hair healthy, and bonus is that I love the scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE the smell of this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the smell of this shampoo. I recently stayed in an Airbnb which had this shampoo, and using this shampoo brings back great memories of a wonderful vacation with wonderful friends.
customer_reviews.author: steve1young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have noticed a difference and i have only used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica amor

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shampoo. I have thick, coarse hair and this shampoo leaves it soft, manageable and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Tamy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my hair feels & smells after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special !
customer_reviews.text: Just a regular shampo , no better or worse than Suave ! My hair was more tangled than normal ! I tried the conditioner with similar ingredients but couldn't even get the knots out of my hair ! Like throwing money away ! I thought Argan oil would do much more than what I received !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah vendetta

customer_reviews.title: Salon Quality Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Works like a salon grade shampoo at a quarter of the price
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Great product! After first use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! After first use, felt like 'life' was put back into my hair. A little too much fragrance for my taste and allergic skin.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo! It leaves your hair shiny
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo! It leaves your hair shiny, clean and full of body. I purchased this product from another website at twice the cost! Thank you Amazon for marvelous products at a price most can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this shampoo! Won't use any other Makes my fine hair fluffy & full
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M.

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo and the Theorie Argan Oil Conditioner for over a year now. I am very pleased with it. I have long hair with highlights and with most other shampoos my highlights, especially, would be very tangled and difficult to ease out when my hair was wet. The ends would be dry and break easily, making regular trims a necessity. My hair is easy to comb out and blow dry now and I don't experience the breakage I did in the past. As a side plus, I really like the gentle scent, and so does my husband.
customer_reviews.author: SiberianLover

customer_reviews.title: It leaves my hair really soft, not CGM-approved
customer_reviews.text: I used to have 3a curls, until I bleached my ends at the salon...I ended up with alot of bleach damage, lost alot of hair, and my curls are fried. This shampoo does have sulfate as one of the top ingredients, but it leaves my hair really soft because it has alot of good oils and keratin, like I'm cowashing with a really good conditioner. Even though it's not Curly Girl Method approved, I'll continue to use it in order to prevent further hair damage/loss, followed by the DevaCurl conditioner. I've been finger-coiling (with DevaCurl products) to train my curls and this shampoo helps!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A+++ for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful shampoo for my hair as the texture and color has changed over time (I'm trying to avoid saying as it turns white, and is drier with age, but I see I'm not succeeding). This is great stuff! It keeps my hair from evolving into an Einstein, or B. Sanders do. A+++ for moisturizing, texture, and maintaining control and volume. Omits cotton head. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna A.

customer_reviews.title: Love all the formulas!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this line for several years now and love every formula I have tried. The scent is fantastic and the way my hair looks so shiny and healthy is even more impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softest hair ever!
customer_reviews.text: Not free of sulfites, so not color safe, but makes your hair as soft as can be!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K Healey

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: It leaves my hair so soft, shiniy and maneagable. It better and cheaper than moroccan oil. Every one in my family has begun to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating/Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've always had dry hair and now it's colored and gray, so moisturizing is even more important. I discovered this line at TJMaxx and it's just excellent care for hair that needs the love.
customer_reviews.author: blazingsun

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo I've ever used. My hair is addicted to this product. My two daughters are able to use as well, this product works well on any texture and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Jones

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo seems to be great for my hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo seems to be great for my hair. Love the smell too. The price here is good, as the bottle is larger for same price as smaller bottle at Walmart and other places. This shampoo can be used on keratin treated hair, so should be good for all hair types
customer_reviews.author: Leslie or Keith Klenk

customer_reviews.title: The smell is amazing. I have dry thick curly hair and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for years. The smell is amazing. I have dry thick curly hair and this leaves it feeling healthy and not too stripped of my hairs natural oil.
customer_reviews.author: nodi90

customer_reviews.title: Phthalate/sulfate Free. Hair still super soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite. I live in Japan with the military and order it online to have it delivered here. Natural, good for pregnancy, leaves my hair soft and does not have sulfates etc.
customer_reviews.author: Leftidea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample and then bought the product. This is really amazing and my hair is silky smooth and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: carmen c fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My hair loves it and has worked great it's healthier than it's ever been and soft smells great
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for shine
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for shine, conditioning and smell. It does not weigh the hair down which is important to me as I have heavy fine straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best shampoo I have so far. It is moisture for hair and prevent from hair loosing
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shampoo and conditioner! I will be buying this product again, so happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: GRACE GRISI

customer_reviews.title: Made for course hair
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel like it's cleaning the hair and heavy, probably made for thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Wildly disappointed in this counterfeit product. Actual Theorie hair products are amazing, this is garbage filled with sulfates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo when used with conditioner. Made my hair feel and look great. Will use again
customer_reviews.author: SHEILA TONEY

customer_reviews.title: It's nonetheless a great shampoo. I haven't compared it with sulfate free ...
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list includes sulfate, which is why I took out a star. It's nonetheless a great shampoo. I haven't compared it with sulfate free ones, but so far it seems fine with the keratin treatment I got.
customer_reviews.author: nahiy

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is terrific and certainly one of my very favorite or even ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried nearly every shampoo that is sulfate free and sodium chloride free - as I keratin my hair. This shampoo is terrific and certainly one of my very favorite or even my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Frisbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It's very moisturizing and, combined with the conditioner, it keeps my hair very shiny. The size lasts me about 3 months. Worth the $30 every time.
customer_reviews.author: ATLHubbard

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Product Description
customer_reviews.text: The product was incorrectly listed as REPAIR Conditioner and I received REFORM Conditioner. They have different ingredients and react differently in dry, curly hair. Was not what I was looking for, nor what I thought I was going to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Weissmann

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for years!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair silky soft and tangle free with the conditioner
customer_reviews.author: M. Aiman

customer_reviews.title: What a scent!
customer_reviews.text: This smells incredible! Also the quality of the container is excellent and the quantity is much more than I anticipated (maybe I just didn't visualize it properly when ordering). I use anti-dandruff shampoo mostly, but this stuff is very nice and works well. The scent is the most amazing thing about it. Fruity, flowery and not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Byrom

customer_reviews.title: Not Sulfate Free
customer_reviews.text: This is sold as Sulfate Free, but the product photo doesn't show the complete ingredient list. Either the formulation was changed or I received a fake? If you go to  you'll see the ingredients match my bottle, not Amazon's pictures. INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA), COCO-GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCO-BETAINE, PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, SALVIA (SAGE) OFFICINALIS OIL, KERATIN, VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL, BOSWELLIA CARTERII OIL, OCTYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM).
customer_reviews.author: bitter purl

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY HAS A NICE FEEL.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this in the sample size and it works great, My hair is fine and it looks fluffy after using these products. There are SLS in the shampoo. The back of the label shown in the description is not accurate. Even on there web sight it says SLS's in the shampoo. I had to give it to a friend who is not bothered by them. To bad I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Willo

customer_reviews.title: It's a gamble
customer_reviews.text: Not so great but it varies by person to person. It proves not so great as I was expecting to be for myself however it could be great for different individual. 1) doesn't give bulk impression to my hair like Purador 2) leaves my hair closely tied together 3) doesn't know whether it stops hair fall 4) doesn't know whether it does the hair growth magic
customer_reviews.author: UJJVAL SONI

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of my color and keratin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! I wash with it twice because I don't wash my hair everyday (causes more damage than good), and the second wash gives a nice lather. I use twice a week and my color and my keratin treatment and staying so nice!
customer_reviews.author: MDami

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't seem like the formula that I received when I purchased the product before.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is no better product for keeping my hair under control. Awesome and smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: great product , small bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great product , but this peticular bottle is too small and it's overpriced. Was expecting an average bottle , but it came in a itty bitty mini bottle , very disappointing. Going back to TJ maxx for this .
customer_reviews.author: seba

product_meta.title: Theorie: Sage - Argan Oil - Restoring Shampoo - Rejuvenate & Moisturize - For All Hair Types - Sulfate Free - Safe for Color & Keratin Treated Hair, 800mL - Label Design May Vary
feature_bullets: BENEFITS: This vitamin-enriched cleanser provides intense moisture and rejuvenation while working aggressively to reconstruct disrepair and restrain further decline as it gently removes dirt and other impurities.
INDICATION: For Severely Damaged, Unresponsive Hair.
COLOR SAFE FORMULA: Safe for color and Keratin treated hair.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Salvia Officinalis Oil, Boswellia Carterii Oil.
FOR PROFESSIONAL RESULTS: Use with Argan Oil Ultimate Reform Conditioner.
